ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
-- Bundled by luabundle {"version":"1.6.0"}
local __bundle_require, __bundle_loaded, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules = (function(superRequire)
	local loadingPlaceholder = {[{}] = true}

	local register
	local modules = {}

	local require
	local loaded = {}

	register = function(name, body)
		if not modules[name] then
			modules[name] = body
		end
	end

	require = function(name)
		local loadedModule = loaded[name]

		if loadedModule then
			if loadedModule == loadingPlaceholder then
				return nil
			end
		else
			if not modules[name] then
				if not superRequire then
					local identifier = type(name) == 'string' and '\"' .. name .. '\"' or tostring(name)
					error('Tried to require ' .. identifier .. ', but no such module has been registered')
				else
					return superRequire(name)
				end
			end

			loaded[name] = loadingPlaceholder
			loadedModule = modules[name](require, loaded, register, modules)
			loaded[name] = loadedModule
		end

		return loadedModule
	end

	return require, loaded, register, modules
end)(nil)
__bundle_register("__root", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
require("makeabag/creator")
end)
__bundle_register("makeabag/creator", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
shape = "square"
bagtype = "normal"
rotate = 0
urls = {
  square = "https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1666858152071990826/9AD455F2CBAEC01B2CBCDDB8B6DC4CE48D14B545/",
  cylinder = "https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1666858152071991282/5C391C2599AE5F6972D6EFA7BFC04B41D6E821E3/",
  hex = "https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1666858349285421330/85514136CA7CC07D1571B594321C1D3D01DC2B2C/",
  triangle ="https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1666858288775771801/9B3BE50061314478867674DFD2262D4CD3DC30A3/",
}
function toggle(player, value, id)
  if value == "True" then
    _G[self.UI.getAttribute(id, "type")] = id
  end
  self.UI.setAttribute(id, "icon", value=="True" and "ui_checkon" or "ui_checkoff")
end

function setRotation(player, value, id)
  rotate = tonumber(value) * 15
  self.UI.setAttribute("rotation", "text", "Rotation: "..tostring(rotate))
end

function doit()
  local url, type, obj
  url = urls[shape]
  if bagtype == "normal" then
    type = 6
  else
    type = 7
  end
  local pos = self.getPosition()
  for i,hit in pairs( Physics.cast({ origin = pos, direction = {x=0, y=1, z=0}, max_distance = 1})) do
      if (hit.hit_object ~= self and hit.hit_object.tag ~= "Surface") then
          obj = hit.hit_object
      end
  end
  if not obj then return end
  local bounds = obj.getBoundsNormalized()
  local position = obj.getPosition()
  local rotation = obj.getRotation()
  obj.setLock(true)
  local new_obj = spawnObject({
    type              = "Custom_Model",
    position          = position-bounds.offset,
    rotation          = rotation+Vector(0, rotate, 0),
    scale             = bounds.size,
    sound             = false,
  })
  new_obj.setCustomObject({
    mesh = url,
    type = type,
  })
  new_obj.setLock(true)
  new_obj.setColorTint(Color(1, 1, 1, 0))
  new_obj.addAttachment(obj)
  new_obj.setLock(false)
  broadcastToAll("Done", "Green")
end

end)
return __bundle_require("__root")
ObjectStates.XmlUI:
<!-- include makeabag/xml.xml -->
<Defaults>
  <Text color='White' fontSize='18'/>
  <ToggleButton textAlignment="MiddleLeft" fontSize='24' preferredHeight='40' colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060' selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd' deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999' onValueChanged="toggle"/>
  <Button fontSize='18' preferredHeight='40' colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#606060' />
</Defaults>

<Panel height='400' width='600' position="0 -450 0">
  <VerticalLayout spacing='5' flexibleHeight="True" padding='5 5 5 5' color='black'>
    <HorizontalLayout preferredHeight="30">
      <Text preferredWidth="1000" alignment='UpperLeft' fontSize='24' text='Options' preferredHeight='40' />
    </HorizontalLayout>
    <VerticalLayout color='#404040' padding='10 10 10 10' spacing='5' childForceExpandHeight="False">
      <ToggleGroup preferredHeight="160">
        <VerticalLayout>
          <HorizontalLayout  spacing="40">
            <ToggleButton id="square" type="shape" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Square" icon='ui_checkon' isOn="True" iconAlignment="Right"/>
            <ToggleButton id="cylinder" type="shape" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Cylinder" icon='ui_checkoff' iconAlignment="Right"/>
          </HorizontalLayout>
          <HorizontalLayout>
            <Text>
              Triangle is orientated point up. Hex with point side.
              Rotate to create more fitting bag.
            </Text>
          </HorizontalLayout>
          <HorizontalLayout  spacing="40">
            <ToggleButton id="hex" type="shape" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Hex" icon='ui_checkoff' iconAlignment="Right"/>
            <ToggleButton id="triangle" type="shape" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Triangle" icon='ui_checkoff' iconAlignment="Right"/>
          </HorizontalLayout>
        </VerticalLayout>
      </ToggleGroup>
      <Text text="Rotation: 0" id="rotation" />
      <Slider onValueChanged='setRotation' minValue='0' maxValue="24" value="0" wholeNumbers="True" preferredHeight='40' />
      <ToggleGroup preferredHeight="50">
        <HorizontalLayout  spacing="40">
          <ToggleButton id="normal" type="bagtype" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Normal Bag" icon='ui_checkon' isOn="True" iconAlignment="Right"/>
          <ToggleButton id="infinite" type="bagtype" minWidth="30" preferredWidth="1000" text="Infinite Bag" icon='ui_checkoff' iconAlignment="Right"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </ToggleGroup>
      <Button text="Create Bag" onClick="doit"/>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>

<!-- include makeabag/xml.xml -->
